Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm this is a structured request to analyze a business process model The user wants a detailed breakdown of each step gateways and flow logic with emphasis on differentiation between standard custom paths and approval loops

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The pseudo BPMN is clearly organized so I can follow its sequential flow while highlighting decision points

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should start by summarizing the overall process purpose then segment it into phases initial request handling parallel validation for standard requests feasibility analysis for custom ones approval logic and final steps

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For gateways I need to explain XOR vs AND clearly as they drive divergence and convergence

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The loop back logic is critical it s not just a rejection but a rework cycle tied to specific paths I ll map conditions for approvals cost customization and clarify how No paths merge back into earlier tasks without dead ends

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The response should avoid jargon but remain precise using the task labels B1 C1 etc as anchors No need to reinvent terminology the user provided clear labels so I ll reuse them consistently
